name: Narendra Modi Stadium
description: Located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. It is one of the stadiums with the highest seating capacity.

name: Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium
description: This is located in Hyderabad, India and also known as Uppal Stadium.

name: Melbourne Cricket Ground
description: This is located in Melbourne, Australia.

name: Eden Gardens
description: Established in 1864, it is the oldest and third largest ground in the world.

name: Lord's
description: Regarded as the home of cricket and located in England.It is the largest Ground in England.

name: MA Chidambaram Stadium
description: It is located in Chennai,India and has the one of the best pitchs for Bowling.It is also called Chepauk Stadium

name: Sawai Mansingh Stadium
description: It is located in Jaipur,India.

name: Bharat Ratna Shri atal Bihari Vajpayee Cricket Stadium
description: It is located in Lucknow,India and it is the fifth largest international stadium in India.It is also called as Ekana Cricket Stadium.

name: Arun Jaitley Stadium
description: It is located in Delhi,India and One of the Oldest Grounds in India.

name: M.Chinnaswamy Stadium
description: It is located in Bengaluru, India and regarded as one of the best grounds.

name: Wankhede Stadium
description: It is located in Mumbai,India and it is the house of the Headquarters for Board of Control for Cricket in India(BCCI).

name: Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium
description: It is located in Mohali,Punjab and it is referred as Mohali stadium rather than it's name.

name: Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium
description: It is located in Dharamshala, India and it is the Highest Stadium in the world.

name: Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium
description: It is located in Pune,India and has regarded to the one of the best stadiums for international cricket.

name: Kennington Oval
description: It is located in Kennington, London,England and had hosted many historical cricket matches.

name: Old Trafford
description: It is located in Trafford,Manchester,England and it is established in 1857 having 168 years history.

name: Trent Bridge
description: It is located in West Brigford, England and is one of the best grounds in the world.

name: Headingley
description: It is located in West West Bridgford,Leeds, England and is one of the best grounds in the world.

name: Edgbaston
description: It is located in Edgbaston, Birmingham, England and is Fourth Largest ground in England.

name: Bellerive Oval
description: This is located in Hobart, Australia.

name: Junction Oval
description: This is located in St Kilda, Melbourne, Australia and one of the historic Grounds of cricket.

name: W.A.C.A. Ground
description: This is located in Perth, Australia and One of the best Grounds in the world.

name: Brisbane Cricket Ground
description: This is located in Brisbane,Queensland, Australia and also known as The Gabba.

name: Adelaide Oval
description: This is located in Adelaide, Australia.

name: Sydney Cricket Ground
description: This is located in Sydney, Australia.

name: Gaddafi Stadium
description: This is located in Lahore, Pakistan and is the headquarters of Pakistan Cricket Board.

name: Multan Cricket Stadium
description: This is located in Multan, Pakistan.

name: National Stadium
description: This is located in Karachi, Pakistan.
